name: Main Characters in Little House Books Trivia Game  | 25 Questions

questions.text: "In The Land of The Big Red Apple"
questions.explanation:
Rose.

	Rose is Laura's daughter.  She was an accomplished author herself.  Written by Roger Lea McBride.

Martha.

	Martha was Laura's great-grandmother and Caroline's grandmother.  This book is the only one written about Martha.  It was written by Melissa Wiley.

Laura.

	This one was written by Laura Ingalls Wilder.  It was about the long hard winter of 1880-81 in DeSmet.

Caroline.

	Written by Maria D. Wilkes.

Charlotte.

	This was the one of the books written about Charlotte.  It was written by Melissa Wiley.  Charlotte was Laura's grandmother.

Caroline.

	Caroline was Laura's mother.  All the books about Caroline were written by Maria D. Wilkes.

Laura.

	The setting for this book was near Pepin, Wisconsin.  Laura's books are all autobiographical except for "Farmer Boy."

Rose.

	This was the first book in the series about Rose.  All were written by Roger Lea McBride.

Laura.

	This was about their life in Minnesota.

Caroline.

	Caroline Ingalls was born Caroline Lake Quiner.

Rose.

	Rose Wilder was born on December 5, 1886 in DeSmet, Dakota Territory.

Almanzo.

	Almazo James Wilder was born on February 13, 1857 near Malone, NY.

questions.text: "On the Other Side of the Hill"
questions.explanation:
Rose.

	Rose married Gillette Lane on March 24, 1909.

Caroline.

	Caroline Lake Quiner married Charles Phillip Ingalls on February 1, 1860 in Concord, Wisconsin.  They had five children.  Caroline passed away on April 20, 1924 in DeSmet.

Laura.

	This books details their life in Walnut Grove, Minnesota.

Rose.

	Rose and Gillette had a son in 1910.  Sadly he passed away the same year.

Rose.

	Rose and Gillette divorced in 1918.

Laura.

	This book describes when Pa took a job with the railroad.  Silver Lake was near the town of DeSmet.  This was the last move Charles and Caroline would make.

Laura.

	This book was also set in DeSmet.

Rose.

	This book is about when Rose was living with her Aunt Eliza Jane in Louisana and going to high school.

Laura.

	This book is about when Laura and Almanzo were courting.

Rose.

	This was the last book in the series about Rose.  Rose died on October 30, 1968.

Laura.

	This was about the first four years of Almanzo and Laura's marriage.  "The First Four Years" wasn't published until 1971, 14 years after Laura's death on February 10, 1957.

questions.text: Laura wrote all of her books at Rocky Ridge Farm?
questions.explanation:
True.

	Laura was in her 60's when she started writing the "Little House"  series of books.

questions.text: When Laura wrote "Little House in the Big Woods" she planned on writing the entire series.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Laura only planned on writing "Little House in the Big Woods."  It turned out to be such a success that she was convinced to write the rest of the series.
